overview_description.description: Eslando is a circular fashion tech startup on a mission to accelerate textile recycling. Our AI-powered sorting technology leverages digital product passports to sort textile waste with pinpoint accuracy. Our solution slashes landfill waste, and empowers fashion brands and waste management companies to efficiently recover materials at scale.

product.name: Relabel
product.description: A digital product passport that provides textile recyclers with composition and certification data, helping brands connect their products with the right recyclers and enabling efficient recycling.
